description:

What if AI requests could be routed like planes at an airport ✈️ Cedric Clyburn breaks down how LLM‑D uses LLMs, RAG, and Kubernetes to build smarter datasets for next‑gen AI. Discover how distributed inference boosts scalability, latency, and cost efficiency.

title: LLM‑D Explained: Building Next‑Gen AI with LLMs, RAG & Kubernetes
